answers.answer: Swelling after delivery can be a sign of toxemia. Do you have a 24/7 nurse line that you can call and talk about your symptoms?
My feet were more swollen after my first baby was born than they were the entire pregnancy. It started about 4-4-5 days after birth and went away after a week or so.
You should seek medical advice. As stated above, the is such a thing as post-partum preeclampsia and it requires attention.
Could be a clot have yourself checked out momma
I concur- call your doc mama!

thanks guys I didn't really do much about it other than keep my feet up drink water and try to stay off of them for the most part the swelling has gone down there's just a tiny bit left my son is now 9 days old

question: I had my baby 5 days ago. . I had a very rough and long labor. I'm in so much pain it's crazy. . My feet are swelled up bad after delivery when I lay down to sleep I feel like I can't breathe and my back and sides hurt. I was induced has this stuff happen to anyone ever
title: pain
